response.overview: KIN is a modern day retelling of the biblical story Kane and Able, set in a zombie apocalyptic world. When Kane is attacked by a Zombie, 'Adam' jumps to his defense, and is bitten in the process. Kane locks his brother up in an abandoned warehouse where they nervously wait to see if the infection will take hold and transform Adam into a zombie. But Adam has a plan of his own which ultimately asks the question: if you had to, could you kill your own brother?
response.title: Kin
